headline: MILE HIGH GROWTH IN DENVER: SOUTHWEST AIRLINES CARGO CELEBRATES OPENING OF NEW FACILITY OFFERING INCREASED CAPACITY
summary: Southwest Airlines Co. (NYSE: LUV) celebrated the grand opening of its expanded Cargo facility at the Denver International Airport (DEN) today, marking a milestone in the airline's continued commitment to invest in infrastructure that supports its growing operations at the airport. The nearly 30,000 square foot warehouse brings a new level of Hospitality to Southwest Airlines® Denver-area Cargo Customers, with six loading docks enabling the Southwest Team to serve multiple Customers at the same

headline: Southwest Airlines’ $28M investment expands cargo capacity in Denver
summary: Southwest Airlines has built its own cargo facility at Denver International Airport so it can move more cargo for customers in the city. The post Southwest Airlines’ $28M investment expands cargo capacity in Denver appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: As more airlines charge for checked bags, travelers are looking for ways to save money. Is shipping your luggage worth it?
summary: As more airlines charge for checked bags, travelers are looking for ways to save money. Is shipping your luggage worth it?
